text:
Codelitt Incubator | Miami | 3 Month Contract w/ option to extend | ONSITE / REMOTE

Position: Designer with web + mobile experience

You'll be working with a team developing the design language and systems, UX, and UI for a software platform used by tenants worldwide. You'll also be tackling some other POCs and R&D projects.

Full job info: https://angel.co/l/UBBCf

Contact: vincent@codelitt.com
